snippet: BURPEE--Robert N. "Bob", 90, of Yorktown Heights, NY, formerly of Ardsley, NY for 54 years, passed away June 13th, 2016. Born in Brooklyn in 1925, to Burt and Sadie "Susan" Burpee. Predeceased by his wife of 60 years, Jeannette (Heyer). Graduated from High School in Queens, and Upsala College and received a Master's from Columbia University. Bob was the owner and Headmaster of the Gramercy Park and Stuyvesant Private Schools in New York City. Bob is survived by three children and their spouses, eight grandchildren, four great-grandchildren and nieces and nephews. Memorial service at the Presbyterian Church in Yorktown Heights, Monday, June 20th, at 3:00pm. For additional information: www.burpeefamily.us 1/3
